briefdescription.para: Dictionary of ObjectPool script components attached to FoodController and keyed by the food name.
Dictionary of max number of food for each type that can be on the screen.
The total number of food that can be on the screen.
Dictionary of spawning probability weights for each type of food.
Property to set food movement mode. (May not actually need this?)

inbodydescription.para: Add force to move food based on food movement mode

briefdescription.para: Randomly gets the name of a food type to spawn Probabilities are weighted To be called in ::SpawnFood()
Coroutine that spawns food on screen Spawns one food object each time it is executed, from a randomly selected type
Coroutine that changes the direction of food movement every random time interval within a range
Spawns a given food object on the string

parameterdescription.para: The name of the food type to spawn

briefdescription.para: Sets the max food count for the specified food type Can be called by Player Ability code
Gets the max food count for the specified food type Can be called by Player Ability code

parameterdescription.para: Food type to get count for

briefdescription.para: Sets the food spawn probability weight for the specified food type Can be called by Player Ability code
Gets the food spawn probability weight for the specified food type Can be called by Player Ability code

parameterdescription.para: Food type to get spawn probability weight for

briefdescription.para: Changes food spawning difficulty Can be called by LevelController to change difficulty of the game
Stops food spawning and change of food direction and freezes all food on screen in place
Restarts food spawning and chaning of food direction
Script attached to FoodController object that controls behavior such as food spawning, and food movement.
